text: "Walk on Water" is a 1995 song by American hard rock band Aerosmith and was taken from their greatest hits album Big Ones. It went to number 16 on the Billboard Mainstream Rock Tracks chart and number 11 in Latvia. == Track listing == # "Walk On Water" (LP Version) # "Deuces Are Wild" (LP Version) # "Line Up" (Smokey Bar Mix) == References == Category:1995 songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Aerosmith songs
title: Walk on Water (Aerosmith song)
